description:
Hosts extension lacks API Samples tests.

Please take a look into the related blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get to know the actions to fix this bug.
title: Hosts extension doesn't have API Sample to documentation

comments.content:
Hosts extension lacks API Samples tests.

Please take a look into the related blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get to know the actions to fix this bug.

commit c9273ab7974d72e935537c3c25110f15096a01e9
Author: Mauro S. M. Rodrigues <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Nov 22 14:22:52 2012 -0500

    Complete API samples for Hosts extension
    
    The API samples for Hosts extension missed power operations (shutdown, reboot
    and startup) and maintenance/status operations.
    
    Complete fix to bug 1070167
